name: BIS 2
description: Better search for bash. It's something that I built when I got tired of readline's default search, and wanted something like flx in emacs, but for bash.

name: Wash
description: The whatever shell, is a project that I worked on mainly to learn how to make effective UIs in terminal, and to learn how to use Linux kernel APIs to manage processes and the like.

name: Half2
description: A b-tree implementation that started out as version control system. Learned how to make effective UIs in terminal, and to learn how to use Linux kernel APIs to manage processes and manage system resources.

name: Kernel
description: Kernel is my OS research project, where I try out some ideas that have been stewing in my brain for long enough, and try to learn as much as I can along the way.
